Title: Fraudsters are trying to steal student data from the State Servic...
Description: Fraudsters are trying to steal students' data from 'State Services' through the system of the Ministry of Education and Science. Students who noticed the scheme told TASS that if the scammers fail to get what they want, then after a while they call their parents, whose names and connections with the students are known to the scammers. The main goal of the attackers who call via WhatsApp is to get students to share their screen during authorization in the state system through the portal 'State Services'.
